name: PII Filter Plugin
author: MCP Gateway Team
description: A plugin to detect and mask Personally Identifiable Information (PII) in prompts and tool results.

name: Deny Filter Plugin
author: MCP Gateway Team
description: A plugin to deny requests based on configurable rules.

name: Regex Filter Plugin
author: MCP Gateway Team
description: A plugin to perform search and replace operations on prompts and tool results using regular expressions.

name: Resource Filter Plugin
author: MCP Gateway Team
description: A plugin to validate and filter resource requests based on protocol and domain.
